article: Different from popular thoughts, sometimes flu is not caused by bad weather. It is caused by viruses in the body.  _  , A/H1N1 flu has been spreading in the most parts in the world. Some studies have now shown that one of  the most usual  ways of spreading the viruses is through the air when  _  A/H1N1 flu-sufferer coughs or sneezes. However, its viruses can sometimes spread by  _  . After a flu-sufferer rubs his nose, the viruses might be spread to his hand. Then a friend  _  to visit him, they shake their hands. The friend then gets something  to eat  by hand, and several days  _  , he is infected. A child  _  is carrying A/H1N1 viruses uses tissues to clean his running nose, although his parents pick up the tissues and carefully throw  _  away, they fail to wash their hands, and they will catch the viruses, too. So it is important for you to wash your hands often, it will stop the viruses from  spreading  in a way.
